sections.name: In any mode
instructions: Press ESC to enter fullscreen view
Press TAB to alternate between editor and scene views
Press KEY_DOWN/KEY_UP to scale image resolution

sections.name: In editor mode
instructions: Drag and drop assets into the viewport to load them
Select a model in the Scene tab to view its properties
Use the gizmos to Translate (G), Rotate (R) or Scale (S) the selected model
Press MOUSE_WHEEL and move the mouse to look around
Press LEFT_SHIFT and move the mouse to move the camera
